subject: Public Speaking
title: The Rule of Three
description: A quick, practical guide to The Rule of Three.

hook.text: Two points feel incomplete. Three feels whole. That's not random.

buildup.text: Structure speeches in threes: three main points, three examples.

discovery.text: Triplets feel natural and memorable to human brains.

twist.text: Pro speakers use rule of three instinctively. Novices miss it.

climax.text: Simplicity is the most effective structure. Complexity kills memory.
